MetricDescription: Average time taken to implement changes scheduled for the period
Target:
X or lower, 
 X % lower than previous period, 
 X % reduction over a defined period

MetricDescription: % of changes that included security review
Target:
X % or higher, 
 X % higher than previous period, 
 X % increase over a defined period

MetricDescription: % of changes that were implemented with security exceptions
Target:
X or lower, 
 X % lower than previous period, 
 X % reduction over a defined period
